Hello, I'm Blase! ̶I̶'̶m̶ ̶c̶u̶r̶r̶e̶n̶t̶l̶y̶ ̶a̶ ̶n̶e̶t̶w̶o̶r̶k̶/̶s̶e̶r̶v̶e̶r̶ ̶a̶d̶m̶i̶n̶i̶s̶t̶r̶a̶t̶o̶r̶ ̶&̶ ̶b̶r̶e̶a̶k̶/̶f̶i̶x̶ ̶t̶e̶c̶h̶ ̶f̶o̶r̶ ̶a̶ ̶l̶o̶c̶a̶l̶ ̶r̶e̶s̶t̶a̶u̶r̶a̶n̶t̶ ̶c̶h̶a̶i̶n̶.̶ I AM FINALLY FREE FROM THAT MISERABLE PLACE! I'm fairly introverted and I don't 'toot' all that often, but feel free to message me about whatever!
